channel.title: Portfolios on Jirong's sandbox

item.title: Performance of Fully Automated Portfolio Management and Algorithmic Trading System (a.k.a. Jarvis)
item.description: Portfolio Performance (Track record from 2020) - Blue Line against Benchmarks (VT: Global Index, EWS: Singapore Index) in other colours. Starting index of 1000 at start of year. Algorithmic trading and portfolio management architecture As of Aug 2020, I’ve fully automated my trading & portfolio management. See here (https://medium.com/datadriveninvestor/designing-and-building-a-fully-automated-algorithmic-trading-portfolio-management-system-6945c6c87620) for the full architecture. As much as possible, I will try to live by this motto: Anything that can’t be automated doesn’t belong to my portfolio.
